reviews.review: Game is interesting to play and also its addictive play this on your own risk :)
good game, fun game. i ate cheese while playing this game and it didnt ruin the cheese. good game
I hate and love this game at the same time.
I mean its alright, Overrated as fuck in my opinion.
It may be old  but my god can it be fun.
I artymcfarty review this game as an absolote bonkers game great
Combines my favorite unhealthy addictions into 1 easy to consume package!
Overall a good game one could really sink their teeth into getting good at. A lot of time and effort goes into it knowing the strats, but is also fun even if you aren't as good.
Please update your cheating protocols. so many cheaters again especially from China

amazing shooting game!
the only problem is there are alot cheating ppl and ppl who join in the lobbys with friend they cheat and even some of them can shut down the MM servers which i cant understand how it can be possible...
the new update with the best of 16 is nice to for fast and short game if u dont have lot of time but its another good update for boost service..

Es un muy buen juego. Me encanta que sea tan simple y tan arcade. Es un juego que te garantiza cientos de horas (miles en mi caso) donde puedes jugar sin aburrirte, ya que cada partida es diferente que la anterior.
